messages.content:
I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: David, Joe, Tommy, Jordan

Here are the rules of the game: 4 point scotch, teams are Jordan & Tommy vs Joe & David. $5 per point. Hammers and double hammers allowed each hole.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"David","pops":[]},{"name":"Joe","pops":[]},{"name":"Tommy","pops":[]},{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["David","Joe","Tommy","Jordan"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Viktor, Jordan, Ali, Joe

Here are the rules of the game: 4 point scotch, Viktor & Jordan against Ali & Joe. $1 per point, points go to $2 once someone goes down $60. Hammers and double hammers allowed. Extra birdies double.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Viktor","pops":[]},{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]},{"name":"Ali","pops":[]},{"name":"Joe","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Viktor","Jordan","Ali","Joe"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

Here are the rules of the game: 8 point scotch game, Kyle & Scottie taking on Joe & Tommy. $3 each point.
